section.title: outputclass is universal
section.p: The outputclass attribute can occur on any element, including elements in DITAVAL documents.

section.title: audience, platform, product, and otherprops are specialized from props
section.p: The conditional attributes audience, otherprops, platform, and product are now formally specialized from props.
The values and processing expectations for chunk are simplified, reflecting the way most DITA users actually used chunking and simplifying the processing required by the chunking feature.
The scale attribute has been adjusted to make it more consistent on the various elements that allow it.
